title: The Human in the Loop
description:
I’m Juan Zúñiga.
My journey into technology began at 18, driven by a firm conviction to follow my own path rather than the 'safe' traditional careers.
What started as a defiant choice has evolved into the central pillar of my life.
I am a lifelong learner who finds energy where others find stress: in the heart of a complex problem.
For me, there is nothing more rewarding—or rejuvenating—than the moment a difficult puzzle is finally solved.
I am constantly expanding my toolkit to build better, smarter solutions.
